It's fun but not worth the full price alone. I recommend getting the valve complete pack during christmas to get more games including this one.

Un CS con un componente singleplayer davvero interessante. Le missioni sono molto belle da giocare, con degli elementi come i gadget con non sono utilizzati in nessun altro gioco della serie(almeno per oggi). Purtroppo le missioni sono sconnesse fra loro, ma ciÃ² non impedisce di potersi divertire.

Best game! I like cs whit history.

Top 2 like:
1. It's like CS. But with short single player stories.
2. Voice acting. It's not good, but rather entertaining anyways.

Top 2 dislike:
1. I could not get scoped weapons to work. This includes the door peeky thingy. Seems like the scope sprites didn't work for me. And terrible lag when scoping in until i switch to another weapon.
2. Enemies with lightning reactions.
Pretty fun, I enjoyed playing some of these maps. I found the hangakai map very hard though. I was only given an shield and a fiveseven. Maybe not the best loadout

This game is pretty fun, It's definitely worth the money you pay it for if you buy it under a discount, or if you get the whole valve pack. The missions are interesting and well made. It takes a diffrerent view on the CS genre, setting it in a singleplayer scenario. It's well polished, and i rarely encountered any game breaking  bugs, or any glitches that bothered me. The game can offer quite a challenge in it's hidden nightmare mode, but some levels, even on a normal difficulty are quite punishing.

Sometimes it puts unreasonable pressure on the player. At the time of game release, there are cases where it is difficult to find an objective because the objective marker does not exist due to a lack of technology. (Maybe) 

Worst of all, due to the absence of subtitles, the deaf player cannot understand the scenario at all. (However, this is also a common point of games in the early 2000s)

Still, the basics of the game can be considered okay. 
Despite it's a little annoying, but if you're an FPS explorer, it's worth trying at least once.
oyun ggÃ¼zel fakat zor ve buglarla dolu

ITs pretty much the same as every other Valve game. Half Life graphics, half life gameplay, everything. The campaign isn't anything special or complicated, but its still fun to play. There's still the issue of corrupted save files like in every old Valve game ever. I don't know why but Valve really decided to make RPG enemies areal pain in the ass and put them in the most inconvenient spots in the map.

It has issues but I think the game is very fun, 8.5/10.
